content: victorian mouse materials required ● 10 yards worsted weight yarn in color a body legs ears ● 2 yards worsted weight yarn in color b tail nose ● scrap of any black yarn for eyes ● size us 3 double pointed needles ● whiskers optional abbreviations ● k knit ● ssk slip slip knit ● k2tog k 2 sts together ● p purl ● dpn s double pointed needle s ● x number of times to work the instruction in parenthesis ● round s round s ● co cast on ● st/sts stitch or stitches ● eor end of round/row ● m1 make 1 see * below * my preferred method of increase is to lift the right leg of the next st place it on the left needle then knit it as you would any other stitch head and body work begins at tip of nose and is worked backwards in one piece through the end of the tail the eor for all rnds/row is located at the bottom/center of head and body set up co 4 sts with color a onto 1 dpn slip sts to the other side of dpn and pulling up the working yarn from the last st as in an icord k4 slip sts to other side of dpn again and pull up working yarn from last st to work the following increases on 3 dpns as follows 1 1st dpn m1 k1 2nd dpn k1 m1 3rd dpn k2 eor 6 sts join sts in the round round 1 k all sts round 2 m1 k2 3x 9 sts round 3 k all sts round 4 m1 k2 4x m1 k1 14 sts rnds 5-6 k all sts round 7 k5 ssk k2tog k5 12 sts rnds 8-9 k all sts round 10 k3 m1 k2 3x m1 k3 16 sts round 11 k all sts round 12 k5 m1 k2 4x k3 20 sts rnds 13-20 k all sts round 21 k2 ssk 4x k2tog 4x k2 12 sts round 22 k2 ssk 2x k2tog 2x k2 8 sts stuff your mouse fully now keeping bottom of body flat and rounding the top round 23 k2 ssk k2tog k2 6 sts row 24 k all sts onto 1 dpn tail cut color a join color b and k all sts all of the row below are worked as an icord sts are slipped to the opposite side of the dpn now and after every row and working yarn is brought up from the last st row 1 k all sts row 2 k2tog k2 ssk 4 sts row 3-7 k all sts row 8 k2tog k2 3 sts row 9-26 k all sts for 18 row or about 3 5 inches from color change cut yarn thread through remaining live sts and pull closed weave loose end down side of tail darn any holes on body or bottom of tail 2 front legs make 2 the same the legs are worked flat
